About.title: About Me
About.description: Hello! I'm Luccas, a Full-Stack developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient solutions. With experience in both front-end and back-end development, I enjoy building applications that provide great user experiences and meet business needs.

Project1.title: Weather checker
Project1.description: Application that queries the OpenWeather API and displays the weather forecast for any city in the world.

Project2.title: Password Manager
Project2.description: Generate secure and customized passwords with different complexity criteria.

Project3.title: Base Converter
Project3.description: Convert numbers between different numeral systems quickly and easily.

Project4.title: My Portfolio
Project4.description: This portfolio was developed using React and Tailwind CSS, showcasing my skills and projects.

Project5.title: Bookboxd
Project5.description: Can search for books and view the technical details that matter, all in fast interface

Social.description: Find me on social media and let's have a chat :)
